price: ពួកគេហុចកែវស្រាឱ្យគ្នានៅក្នុងវា(ឋានសួគ៌)ដែលពុំមាន ពាក្យសំដីឥតប្រយោជន៍ និងបាបកម្មនៅក្នុងនោះឡើយ។
arabic: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا لَّا لَغۡوٞ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: yatanāzaʿūna fīhā kasan lā laghwun fīhā walā tathīmun
translations: They will pass to one another
